titles.title: I'm Going To Jerusalem, I'm Going There To Die

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm going to Jerusalem, I'm going there to die,
For I have a revelation that the devil can't deny...

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1 - For I am that revelation of the Son of God to be
And I'm going to Jerusalem to find my liberty.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
2 - For I am the way, the truth, the life, I am the
Victory and I'm going to Jerusalem to set creation free.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
3 - I am the resurrection, I am the life of God and
I am that little lily pushing up the heavy clod.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
4 - For I heard the words of Jesus when He prophesied of me
And I'm going to Jerusalem, to fulfill prophesy.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
5 - For I know my God is hiding me in the secret of His
Stairs and I'm going to Jerusalem to meet my beloved there.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
I am going to the wilderness, and I'm going there to die
For I have a revelation that the devil can't deny
For Father God has called me and this is why I sing
O grave where is thy victory, O death where is thy sting?
